jishoData.meaning: protect, shield, defend, eaves, canopy, penthouse, visor

onyomiExamples.meaning: awning (over a window, doorway, etc.), eaves (of a roof), narrow aisle surrounding the core of a temple building, visor (of a cap), brim, peak, classic Japanese women's low pompadour hairstyle

kunyomiExamples.meaning: awning (over a window, doorway, etc.), eaves (of a roof), narrow aisle surrounding the core of a temple building, visor (of a cap), brim, peak, classic Japanese women's low pompadour hairstyle
classic Japanese women's low pompadour hairstyle
to protect (someone), to look after (e.g. an injured leg), to defend, to cover for, to stand up for, to stick up for
